data.name: REF_EW_TAKING_PLACE
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. Entry week is currently taking place. Trade pairs are not formed until closed.

data.name: REF_MISSING_ART
data.value: Missing art reference <@{0}>. Please provide an embeded image.

data.name: REF_MISSING_PARTNER
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. Could not find an art trade partner for you.

data.name: REF_NOT_REG
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. There is no reference registered.

data.name: REF_REMOVED
data.value: <@{0}> your reference has been removed.

data.name: REF_REVEAL_FINAL
data.value: Hello <@{0}>! Your hidden art trade partner was **{1}** and they are ready to show you their work!!

data.name: REF_REVEAL_MISSING_PARTNER
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. Could not find your trade partner.

data.name: REF_REVEAL_NOTIFY
data.value: A notification was sent to your partner <@{0}>.

data.name: REF_REVEAL_SORRY
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. But your partner did not receive the notification.

data.name: REF_REVEAL_THANKS
data.value: Thank you for the art reveal <@{0}>!

data.name: REF_TRADE_MISSING_REF
data.value: Missing reference <@{0}>. Please provide a description and/or embeded image.

data.name: REF_TRADE_PARTNER
data.value: Your art trade partner is.. {1}, have fun <@{0}>!

data.name: REF_TRADE_REG_SUCC
data.value: Your entry has been registered successfully <@{0}>!

data.name: REF_TRADE_TAKING_PLACE
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. Art trade is currently taking place. Can't modify existing entries

data.name: REF_TRADE_THEME
data.value: Theme of this art trade is.. \"{0}\"

data.name: TRADE_ADMIN_BLOCK
data.value: Sorry <@{0}>. You don't have required priviledges to run this command.

data.name: TRADE_ART_IN_PROGRESS
data.value: <@{0}> the art trade month is already in progress.

data.name: TRADE_ART_LATE
data.value: Following users did not reveal their art, please do so once you are ready (you can reveal it even after the trade ended): {0}

data.name: TRADE_ART_ON_TIME
data.value: Everyone submitted their art on time!

data.name: TRADE_BACKUP_DATABASE_DONE
data.value: Sending the full database <@{0}>.

data.name: TRADE_BACKUP_DONE

data.name: TRADE_BACKUP_HISTORY_DONE
data.value: Sending the full history stream <@{0}>.

data.name: TRADE_CHANGE_PAIR_DONE
data.value: <@{0}> the art trade partner of {1} has been changed to {2}.

data.name: TRADE_CHANGE_PAIR_MISSING_FIRST

data.name: TRADE_CHANGE_PAIR_MISSING_SECOND

data.name: TRADE_CHANGE_PAIR_PROBLEM

data.name: TRADE_ENTRIES_CLEARED

data.name: TRADE_EW_IN_PROGRESS
data.value: <@{0}> the entry week is already in progress.

data.name: TRADE_LISTING_ALL
